full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I GTOR CHOG BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I GTOR TSOGS BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SHAR MAR SPEL BA'O,, ,,)
